324250.name: Knights of Pen and Paper - Haunted Fall
324250.description:
Knights of Pen & Paper: Haunted Fall expands on the unmistakable charm and wit of the original game with more enemies, more epic quest and more locations in a spine tingling Halloween setting.

Navigate an engrossing new quest line where you square off against unruly Jack o Lanterns, wobbly undead and a mish mash of bewildered monsters. Halloween will never be the same again!

As both the playing characters AND the game master, players can choose which battles to fight. Put together a bunch of monsters to make for a challenging fight and your efforts will be equally rewarded!

Main features:
  • New Area – Otherworld
  • 4 multi-level dungeon
  • New Location in Black forest
  • New character class
  • 16 new monsters
  • 31 new items
  • 5 new NPC
324250.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 法语
